code: import Types from'./cart-types';export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:Types.TOGGLE_CART_HIDDEN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:Types.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:Types.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearItemFromCart=function clearItemFromCart(item){return{type:Types.CLEAR_ITEM_FROM_CART,payload:item};};export var clearCart=function clearCart(){return{type:Types.CLEAR_CART};};export var addPreviousUserCart=function addPreviousUserCart(userCart){return{type:Types.ADD_PREVIOUS_USER_CART,payload:userCart};};
